predictions.text: U.S. Average Hourly Earnings m/m (seasonally adjusted) for August 2025 will be between 0.2% and 0.3%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify using the BLS Employment Situation news release for August 2025: Table B-3 shows total private employees’ average hourly earnings m/m percent change equals 0.2% or 0.3% on the initial release.
predictions.rationale: Wage growth is slowing alongside softer labor demand; base-case m/m remains 0.2–0.3%.

predictions.text: U.S. nonfarm payrolls (change in total nonfarm employment, SA) for August 2025 will be between +130,000 and +230,000.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify via the BLS Employment Situation news release: the initial August 2025 headline change in total nonfarm payroll employment is within +130k to +230k.
predictions.rationale: Hiring is cooling but not collapsing; a print near 180k remains plausible.

predictions.text: The U.S. 2-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS2) will close at or below 3.85% on at least one trading day by 2025-09-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm using FRED series DGS2 daily close values: any close ≤ 3.85% from 2025-09-01 through 2025-09-30.
monitoring_signals: CME FedWatch probabilities for September FOMC
ECB guidance and global risk sentiment
predictions.rationale: Soft U.S. data and global easing bias increase odds of a front-end rally.

predictions.text: The Cboe Volatility Index (VIX) will close at or above 20.00 on at least two trading days by 2025-09-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use Cboe historical data for symbol VIX: count official closes ≥ 20.00 from 2025-09-01 through 2025-09-30; require at least two distinct trading days.
monitoring_signals: VIX futures term structure and VVIX
Macro event calendar (NFP, CPI, ECB, FOMC)
predictions.rationale: September seasonality and dense macro/geopolitical catalysts support multiple VIX spikes.

predictions.text: For the week ending 2025-09-06, EIA will report a U.S. total motor gasoline inventory draw of at least 1.5 million barrels on 2025-09-11.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify via EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report dated 2025-09-11: total motor gasoline ending stocks decreased by ≥1.5 million barrels versus the prior week for week ending 2025-09-06.
monitoring_signals: Rack and wholesale gasoline price trends
predictions.rationale: Late-season demand plus refinery transitions often draw gasoline stocks into mid-September.

predictions.text: Between 2025-09-01 and 2025-09-30 (UTC), UKMTO will issue at least six incident reports/advisories for the Red Sea, Bab el-Mandeb, or Gulf of Aden.
predictions.verification_criteria: Count UKMTO advisories/alerts/incident reports dated 2025-09-01 to 2025-09-30 inclusive with locations in the Red Sea, Bab el-Mandeb, or Gulf of Aden; total must be ≥6 as listed on ukmto.org.
monitoring_signals: UKMTO alert feed and area maps
predictions.rationale: Retaliatory rhetoric and persistent threat activity sustain frequent maritime incident reporting.

predictions.text: Drewry WCI Shanghai–Los Angeles weekly spot rate published on or before 2025-09-26 will be at least 12% higher than the 2025-08-29 reading.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compare Drewry World Container Index route 'Shanghai–Los Angeles' value published on or before 2025-09-26 to the 2025-08-29 reading; success if percentage increase ≥12%.
monitoring_signals: Red Sea risk and rerouting impacts
predictions.rationale: Peak-season demand, capacity management, and disruption spillovers support higher Transpacific spot rates.

predictions.text: At Apple’s September 9, 2025 event, the U.S. starting price for the base iPhone 16 will be announced as $799 (unchanged from iPhone 15).
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm via Apple’s press release or product page that the base iPhone 16 U.S. MSRP is $799 at announcement; verify against Apple Newsroom/product pages.
monitoring_signals: BOM cost estimates for new iPhone
USD index and FX hedging impacts
predictions.rationale: Apple often holds baseline prices to preserve unit demand; competitive dynamics and stable FX support unchanged MSRP.
